info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDowell, Rutherford, northeastern Henderson and northern Polk Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Rutherfordton, or 6 miles east of Lake Lure, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forest City, Rutherfordton, Spindale, Lake Lure, Ellenboro, Bostic, Chimney Rock Village, Chimney Rock State Park, Bat Cave and Green Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
